original_name: The Adventures of Ma & Pa Kettle Vol 1 Disc 2
name: The Adventures of Ma & Pa Kettle Vol 1 Disc 2
overview: Percy Kilbride and Marjorie Main are the titular Kettles in this collection of four feature films based on the folksy, homespun series that was popular in the late 1940s and early '50s. Follow the humorous adventures (such as finding uranium in the backyard and winning a model home) of this eccentric hillbilly couple living in a rundown shack with 14 of their 15 children. Included is The Egg and I, for which Main received a Best Supporting Actress nod. Cast:Marjorie Main, Percy Kilbride, Richard Long, Meg Randall, Patricia Alphin, Esther Dale, Barry Kelley, Harry Antrim, Isabel O'Madigan, Ida Moore, Emory Parnell, Boyd Davis, O.Z. Whitehead, Ray Bennett, Alvin Hammer, Lester Allen, Chief Yowlachie, Rex Lease, Charles McGraw, Gregg Martell, Jim Backus, Bert Freed, Hal March, Elliott Lewis, Douglas Kennedy, Paul McVey, Ray Collins, Barbara Brown, Claudette Colbert, Fred MacMurray, Louise Allbritton, Billy House, Donald MacBride, Samuel S. Hinds
